Name: GasZilla
About the game: GasZilla - This 2D game, is a about a huge lizard that has awakened after a thousand years of sleep and goes to destroy everything in its path. Your task is to destroy cities, making your way through armies of advancing soldiers, tanks and robots, you will have to destroy all the buildings so that Gazzilla can sleep peacefully again. Don't let the military stop you from destroying everything around you, finish as soon as possible Game Features: pumping characters, many enemies, pixel graphics in Alexia, music to Henol.
